name: Residence Inn San Bernardino

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a beautiful, well accomodated property in an excellent location. Absolutely what you would expect from the Marriott brand. The service however was not the best. We called ahead to inform them of our late arrival as we had a reservation. Yet when we did arrive, the night desk clerk was not exactly friendly or welcoming... not even a smile! The next morning we requested a late check out, but the front desk apparently neglected to tell housekeeping. Oops! The worst part was finding a used washcloth on a tub "shelf" from a previous guest. GROSS! Obviously an oversight from housekeeping. Would loved to have enjoyed the pool facilities but when it's 90º outside who wants a hot, sticky indoor pool? With the climate here, they need an outdoor pool. We love to stay at Marriot properties, and will again. Maybe it was just an off day for these folks? ??
reviews.title: Beautiful property, but service not the Marriott quality we expect

reviews.text: During my stay at Residence Inn San Bernardino, I was treated respectfully and professionally. When I needed assistance, it was always quick with a smile. I felt welcome during my stay. I would recommend this hotel to everyone, including families with furry faces.
reviews.title: Home Away from Home

reviews.text: My stay was a long one which extended from 5 weeks to 10. This hotel is perfect for a business traveller, located just off Interstate 10 with many famous stores and restaurants close nearby. Spacious suites with very comfortable beds and amazing pillows guaranteed to give you a that good night sleep. Nice fitness room next to the indoor pool and jacuzzi. Guests have access to the hotel barbeque grill, a laundry room, half basketball court and other conveniences. The hotel staff were so nice and friendly and made my stay a pleasant one.
reviews.title: Great Location

reviews.text: I have been at the Residence Inn for 2 months with 56 techs from Amazon doing training locally. The staff at the Residence Inn is just outstanding. They have adjusted food schedules for my early morning teams, providing breakfast at 3am versus the 6am stated time. Marjorie the AGM is just Outstanding. The facility and the team are always polite and courteous and has adjusted schedules for me team moving from several hotels locally to be consolidate here. great job Residence Inn team and we thank your for making our stay feel like home.
reviews.title: Thanks from Amazon

aka: Residence Inn San Bernardino Hotel San Bernardino
description: The Residence Inn Hotel is the only extended stay property in the Inland Empire. Our suites are approximately 50% larger than your standard hotel room. All of our rooms feature a fully equipped kitchens and separate living room areas. We also offer a complimentary hot buffet breakfast and evening social hour.
